Good question, whoever put up that poll. I guess its time for me to
reveal the project I've been working on for the past long while.

For the past few weeks, I've been making a login feature (I lost most
of what I had when my comp crashed, but I'm redoing it) for the site.
This login feature will include functions like being able to log in
and edit your char profiles, create new chars and have them added
quicker to the char list (they'll still have to be reviewed, but it'll
be easier and quicker to add them), a member chat room and message
board (I found some bugs in my message board, and am currently fixing
them), and the ability for faction commanders to edit their faction
profile, though that's a long shot. The final feature of this system
is the ability to vote from the site.

Anyways, the first scheduled vote will be a reelection of the council.
The details are still being made, but the general goal is to give
power to the active players and stuff. I also want to have some help
making rulings and stuff.

The people I've discussed this too suggested the following. These are
all up to the members in the end though, but here's what me and a few
people came up with:

1. There will be council reelections periodically (how often is
undecided. 1 month and 2 month periods have been suggested)
2. Once elected (at least the first new council), the new council will
review all current rules, policies, and everything and adjust them if
neccessary.
3. The council will consist of either 3 or 5 people, and everything
will be decided by votes. Votes will last 24 hours, and if council
members fail to vote within that span, the matter is closed and
whichever side won wins even if not all the council members have
voted.
4. If any matter is brought up by a member and seconded by another
member, the council has to vote on it, unless its already been brought
up before.

I think there's it. Well, there's one more thing. Some of the people I
talked to suggested that I be a permenent part of the council (reasons
are that I have the eGroups club thing, update the site, etc..), and I
don't know how the rest of y'all would feel about this. This, along
with everything else, is up to you members.

So, everyone email me with your ideas. The more ideas I get, the
better this idea can be.


rAuq, can you print this message out and give it to Rdahl, and give me
his input? Thanx.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., nbwrpg@y... wrote:
